statements: DELETE FROM A_B_testing WHERE marketing_strategy = 'SEO' AND conversion_rate > 0.05;
DELETE FROM A_B_testing WHERE country = 'Canada' OR marketing_strategy = 'PPC';
DELETE FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Social Media Campaign';
DELETE FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1 AND audience_size > 1000;
DELETE FROM test_results WHERE test_id = 5 AND strategy_id IN (SELECT strategy_id FROM marketing_strategies WHERE conversion_rate < 0.05);
DELETE FROM marketing_strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Inactive Strategy';
DELETE FROM marketing_strategies WHERE id = 1 AND conversion_rate > 5.00;
DELETE FROM user_data WHERE strategy_id = 2 AND name LIKE '%John%';
DELETE FROM experiment_results WHERE significant = true AND conversion_rate < 2.50;
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 5 AND username = 'example_username';
DELETE FROM ab_tests WHERE test_id > 100 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Strategy3 WHERE end_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
